name: Balloid
description:
Are you bored with playing old arcade, casual games?

Why are you waiting? "Balloid" an arcade game is available to you all for free!!!

Balloid is a new arcade game where you have to control a ball that runs on some thin road. And the ball will never stop moving.

How to Play:

Once the game starts click and make the right moves to keep the ball on the platform. When the ball will touch the circle it will jump. But don't make it fall down otherwise the game will end.
